name: Ultron
introduce: Ultron Foundation is an EVM-compatible layer-1 blockchain system leverages a leaderless Proof-of-Stake (POS) protocol and asynchronous Byzantine Fault Tolerant consensus mechanism. Ultron protects privacy by limiting the sharing of transaction details to only those involved in the transaction. Ultron can transfer any type of data, digital asset, or standard token via cross-blockchain capabilities.
